column3: You've found your way to the Quicksand, friend. As you can see, we cater to a clientele with an adventurous streak.
With the chaos left in the wake of the Calamity, the townsfolk'll be needin' the help of my patrons more than ever.

Adventurers aspirin' to greatness come through all the time, but it's rare to see one that actually achieves some measure of success. Keep at it, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, and who knows what you'll accomplish?
You've found your way to the Quicksand, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. As you can see, we cater to a clientele with an adventurous streak.
With the chaos left in the wake of the Calamity, the townsfolk'll be needin' the help of my patrons more than ever─especially accomplished adventurers like yourself.
Well, if it ain't the legendary Warrior of Light! The savior of Eorzea! And in <Emphasis>my</Emphasis> bar! Why, just lookin' at you makes me weak in the knees!
Oh, don't make that face, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! I'm just havin' a bit of fun with you.
Ah, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! I'm pleased to say that my overzealous suitor's not been back since you helped me chase him away.
I'm not generally one to stomp on anyone's dreams, of course...unless those dreams involve me an' matrimonial bliss. Then I'll <Emphasis>gladly</Emphasis> smash and dash 'em to smithereens!
Twelve be praised, you're still alive and well! When I started hearin' rumors about what happened at the feast, I didn't know what to think.
I tried gettin' answers, but the Brass Blades've made their rounds. Folk around here're carryin' on as though naught's changed.
But deep down, they know it's a lie. It's only a matter of time before the questions come, and Lord Lolorito better have some good answers by then...
